attributes.action: concentrate on running the country rather than declaring sympathy for everything
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gordon Brown seems to be in charm offensive overdrive - from the cabinet meeting in Birmingham to the gushing congratulations of Theo Walcott and sympathy for the football fans who couldn't see the match.  It makes me nervous that the real work of government is being neglected.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
